You plan to visit 5 European cities for 21 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You plan to stay in Athens for 6 days. You plan to stay in Paris for 7 days. You would like to visit Reykjavik for 6 days. You are going to attend a wedding in Reykjavik between day 1 and day 6. You would like to visit Valencia for 3 days. You would like to meet your friends at Valencia between day 12 and day 14 to tour together. You plan to stay in Santorini for 3 days.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
from Reykjavik to Athens, Paris and Athens, Reykjavik and Paris, Athens and Santorini, from Valencia to Athens, Paris and Valencia.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 21 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
